AGENT_BOTS.DESCRIPTION: Bot dai ly giong nhu thanh vien tuyet voi nhat trong nhom cua ban. Ho co the xu ly nhung viec nho de ban tap trung vao nhung viec quan trong. Hay thu. Ban co the quan ly bot tu trang nay hoac tao bot moi bang nut 'Them Bot'.
AGENT_BOTS.LEARN_MORE: Tim hieu ve bot dai ly

AVATAR.SUCCESS_DELETE: Anh dai dien bot da duoc xoa thanh cong
AVATAR.ERROR_DELETE: Loi khi xoa anh dai dien bot, vui long thu lai

BOT_CONFIGURATION.TITLE: Chon mot bot dai ly
BOT_CONFIGURATION.DESC: Gan Bot dai ly cho hop thu den cua ban. Ho co the xu ly hoi thoai ban dau va chuyen cho nhan vien khi can.
BOT_CONFIGURATION.SUCCESS_MESSAGE: Da cap nhat bot dai ly thanh cong.
BOT_CONFIGURATION.DISCONNECTED_SUCCESS_MESSAGE: Da ngat ket noi bot dai ly thanh cong.
BOT_CONFIGURATION.ERROR_MESSAGE: Khong the cap nhat bot dai ly. Vui long thu lai.
BOT_CONFIGURATION.DISCONNECTED_ERROR_MESSAGE: Khong the ngat ket noi bot dai ly. Vui long thu lai.

API.SUCCESS_MESSAGE: Bot da duoc them thanh cong.
API.ERROR_MESSAGE: Khong the them bot. Vui long thu lai sau.

LIST.404: Khong tim thay bot nao. Ban co the tao bot bang cach nhan nut 'Them Bot'.

CONFIRM.TITLE: Xac nhan xoa
CONFIRM.MESSAGE: Ban co chac chan muon xoa {name}?

API.SUCCESS_MESSAGE: Bot da duoc xoa thanh cong.
API.ERROR_MESSAGE: Khong the xoa bot. Vui long thu lai.

API.SUCCESS_MESSAGE: Bot da duoc cap nhat thanh cong.
API.ERROR_MESSAGE: Khong the cap nhat bot. Vui long thu lai.

ACCESS_TOKEN.TITLE: Token truy cap
ACCESS_TOKEN.DESCRIPTION: Sao chep token truy cap va luu giu an toan
ACCESS_TOKEN.COPY_SUCCESSFUL: Token truy cap da duoc sao chep vao bo nho tam
ACCESS_TOKEN.RESET_SUCCESS: Token truy cap da duoc tao lai thanh cong
ACCESS_TOKEN.RESET_ERROR: Khong the tao lai token truy cap. Vui long thu lai

ERRORS.NAME: Ten bot la bat buoc
ERRORS.VALID_URL: Vui long nhap URL hop le bat dau bang http:// hoac https://

WEBHOOK.DESCRIPTION: Cau hinh webhook bot de tich hop voi dich vu tuy chinh cua ban. Bot se nhan va xu ly su kien tu hoi thoai va co the phan hoi chung.
